modShortDescription: Don't zombies prey on animal meat too? This small 7 Days to Die mod is Xaliber's attempt to fix that issue. His first time modding 7DTD.
modDescription:
Xaliber always find it weird each time he find [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) spawning near stags, they just stand there shambling around, doing nothing. Don’t zombies prey on [animal](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-animals/) meat too?

This small 7 Days to Die mod is Xaliber’s attempt to fix that issue. His first time modding 7DTD.

**Changelog:**  
\-Zombies attack boars.

The mod is best used in conjunction with mods that add more animals so you don’t run out of animals to hunt. e.g: [Invisible Animal Fix](https://7daystodiemods.com/invisible-animal-fix/) or Increase Animal Spawn

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/xaliber/Mods_7DaystoDie/tree/master/Xal_SetZombiesAttackAnimals)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16603-zombies-hunt-too-allow-zombies-to-attack-animals/).

**Credits:** Xaliber
